========================
PyNN 0.8.1 release notes
========================

25th May 2016

Welcome to PyNN 0.8.1!


NEST 2.10
---------

This release introduces support for NEST_ 2.10. Previous versions of NEST are no longer supported.

Other changes
-------------

  * `Assorted bug fixes`_



.. _NEST: http://www.nest-simulator.org/
.. _`Assorted bug fixes`: https://github.com/NeuralEnsemble/PyNN/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3A0.8.1
